mapper.select: select * from userMissionLogs where userId=#{userId} and valid=1

select a.missionId,b.powerPrize,a.finishCount,a.targetCount from userMissionLogs a left join dicUserMission b on a.missionId=b.missionId where a.userId=#{userId} and a.missionId=#{missionId} and a.valid=1

select a.missionId,b.missionName,b.missionCondition,b.powerPrize,a.finishCount,a.targetCount,a.status,a.daystamp,b.actionStatus,b.actionLink,b.endTime from userMissionLogs a left join dicUserMission b on a.missionId=b.missionId where a.userId=#{userId} and b.missionType=#{missionType} and a.valid=1 order by a.updateTime desc
mapper.update: update userMissionLogs set status=#{status} where userId=#{userId} and missionId=#{missionId} and valid=1
update userMissionLogs set status=#{status},finishCount=#{finishCount} where userId=#{userId} and missionId=#{missionId} and valid=1
update userMissionLogs set status=1,finishCount=(finishCount+1),updateTime=now(),daystamp=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') where userId=#{userId} and missionId=#{missionId} and valid=1
update userMissionLogs set valid=0 where userId=#{userId} and missionId=#{missionId} and valid=1
mapper.insert: insert into userMissionLogs (userId, missionId, daystamp, createTime,updateTime,finishCount,targetCount) values (#{userId},#{missionId}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d'),now(),now(),#{finishCount},#{targetCount})
mapper.select: select count(1) from userMissionLogs a left join dicUserMission b on a.missionId=b.missionId where a.userId=#{userId} and a.valid=1 and a.status=1 and b.missionType=#{missionType}
mapper.update: update userMissionLogs set finishCount=1,status=1 where userId=#{userId} and missionId=5 and status=2 and valid=1
